/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with tall buildings, their gray and white facades standing out against the blue sky. The buildings are adorned with numerous windows and balconies, hinting at the bustling city life within. Power lines crisscross above, connecting the buildings and adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. On the right side of the street, trees and bushes provide a touch of greenery, contrasting with the concrete structures. The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
